courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: GE 320 and MATH 415.
description: Design methods; time domain modeling; trajectories and phase plane analysis; similarity transforms; controllability and observability; pole placement and observers; linear quadratic optimal control; Lyapunov stability and describing functions; simulation. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: GE 320 and MATH 415.
label: State Space Design for Control
